name: sunken eyes (brie_irl)
description:
short horror-puzzle-platformer game i made 95% of as a teenager and decided to finish 5 years later

CONTROLS:
arrow keys to move and jump
r to restart level
f11 to toggle fullscreen

does this work on mac or linux? i have no idea. please tell me. thanks.

reupload from an alt account of mine, originally released Sep. 2018.
